mapper.insert: INSERT INTO recording (number, articleID, views, download, likes, hides, publishTime, viewsMoney, downloadsMoney, likesMoney, hidesMoney) VALUES (#{number}, #{articleID}, #{views}, #{download}, #{likes}, #{hides}, #{publishTime}, #{viewsMoney}, #{downloadsMoney}, #{likesMoney}, #{hidesMoney})
mapper.select: SELECT uuid FROM article WHERE likes = 0 LIMIT #{number};
